name: Introduction to Metaphysics
description: This course provides an introduction to the major metaphysical theories, such as being, truth, reality, and identity.

name: Philosophy of Language
description: This course examines philosophical theories of language and its role in understanding and expressing reality.

name: Philosophy of Mind
description: This course examines philosophical theories of mind and consciousness, including debates about the nature of mental states and their relation to the physical world.

name: Philosophy of Religion
description: This course examines the philosophical issues arising from the existence of God, religious experience, and religious belief.

name: Advanced Metaphysics
description: This course provides an in-depth examination of metaphysical theories, including debates about the nature of being, truth, reality, and identity.
